definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: †I. [[[מוּשׁ]], [[מִישׁ]] B?:ii. 512 f.; but Thes K?:i. 511 think purely [[ו]]“[[ע]]]

definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: depart, remove (Ar. ma0sa ([[י]]) is walk with elegant, proud, self-conceited gait);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[וּמָשׁ]] consec. Zec 14:4; [[וּמַשְׁתִּ֫י]] Zec 3:9; [[מָ֫שׁוּ]] Nu 14:44; Impf. [[יׇמוּשׁ]] Jos 1:8, Is 54:10, etc.;—depart, mostly of inanimate things ( = be removed) sq. [[מִן]] Jos 1:8, Is 59:21, Je 31:36; without prep. Pr 17:13 Qr, Is 22:25, Is 54:10, Is 54:10 (‖[[מוֹט]]); sq. [[ה]] loc. Zec 14:4; sq. [[מִן]] pers. Ju Jdg 6:18; of both Nu 14:44; trans. remove, sq. acc. Zec 3:9.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יׇמִישׁ]] Ex 13:22 + 6 t., etc.; remove, take away, sq. [[מִז]] Mic 2:3; sq. [[לְ]] v:Mic 2:4 (but LXX Sta:ZAW vi. 1886, 122f. [[אֵין מֵשִׁיב]] for [[אֵיךְ יׇמִישׁ]]); depart, sq. [[מִן]] pers. Ex 33:11; fig. recede Job 23:12; of idol, leave its place, Is 46:7; of other inanimate things, sq. [[מִן]] Ex 13:22; fig. Ps 55:12, Pr 17:13 Kt (Qr [[יׇמוּשׁ]]); without prep., abs., Na 3:1, subj. [[טֶרֶף]]; of righteous under fig. of tree, [[לאׁ יׇמִישׁ מֵעֲשׂוֹת פֶָּרִי]] Je 17:8, i.e. shall not cease.
